name: Me And The Boys
description:
WELCOME TO FUTURE In this game you are a robot and you can't die,you respawn but every time you respawn you get friends to fight for you.Your goal is not surviving from the waves,get more friends but don't forget,this also works for the enemy.As you get stronger,the enemy gets stronger too.As you complete waves you get new weapons.

Made by Qeui and Crown
